Class: CloudinaryContext

CloudinaryContext

Provides a container for Cloudinary components. Any option set in CloudinaryContext will be passed to the children.

Constructor

new CloudinaryContext()

Source:
  • components/CloudinaryContext/CloudinaryContext.js, line 13
Example
<CloudinaryContext cloudName="mycloud" dpr="auto">
   <!-- other tags -->
   <Image publicId={id}/>
</CloudinaryContext>
